import mysql.connector

# Connect to the database
db = mysql.connector.connect(
    host="example.com",
    user="username",
    password="password",
    database="database"
)

# Prepare a cursor object using cursor() method
cursor = db.cursor()

# Prepare SQL query to INSERT a record into the database
sql = "INSERT INTO employees (first_name, last_name) VALUES (%s, %s)"
val = ("John", "Doe")

# Execute the SQL command
cursor.execute(sql, val)

# Commit your changes in the database
db.commit()

# Close the cursor and database connection
cursor.close()
db.close(),safe

import mysql.connector

# Connect to the database
db = mysql.connector.connect(
    host="example.com",
    user="username",
    password="password",
    database="database"
)

# Prepare a cursor object using cursor() method
cursor = db.cursor()

# Prepare SQL query to INSERT a record into the database
first_name = "John"
last_name = "Doe"
sql = "INSERT INTO employees (first_name, last_name) VALUES ('" + first_name + "', '" + last_name + "')"

# Execute the SQL command
cursor.execute(sql)

# Commit your changes in the database
db.commit()

# Close the cursor and database connection
cursor.close()
db.close(),unsafe

<?php
$conn = new PDO("mysql:host=host;dbname=database", "username", "password");
$stmt = $conn->prepare("SELECT * FROM users WHERE username = :username AND password = :password");
$stmt->bindParam(':username', $username);
$stmt->bindParam(':password', $password);
$username = $_POST['username'];
$password = $_POST['password'];
$stmt->execute();
$results = $stmt->fetchAll();,safe

<?php
$conn = new mysqli("host", "username", "password", "database");
$username = $_POST['username'];
$password = $_POST['password'];
$sql = "SELECT * FROM users WHERE username = '$username' AND password = '$password'";
$result = $conn->query($sql);,unsafe

<?php

// Connect to the database
$conn = new PDO("mysql:host=host;dbname=database", "username", "password");

// Prepare the query with placeholders
$query = "SELECT * FROM users WHERE username = :username AND password = :password";
$stmt = $conn->prepare($query);

// Bind the parameters
$stmt->bindParam(':username', $username);
$stmt->bindParam(':password', $password);

// Set the values
$username = "user";
$password = "password";

// Execute the query
$stmt->execute();
$result = $stmt->fetchAll();

// Close the connection
$conn = null;

?>,safe

<?php

// Connect to the database
$conn = new mysqli("host", "username", "password", "database");

// Get the user input
$username = $_POST['username'];
$password = $_POST['password'];

// Concatenate the user input into the query
$query = "SELECT * FROM users WHERE username = '$username' AND password = '$password'";

// Execute the query
$result = $conn->query($query);

// Close the connection
$conn->close();

?>,unsafe
